column1: # personal pronouns
ja          yo        personal  pronoun  1st  singular
ty          tu        personal  pronoun  2nd  singular
on          el        personal  pronoun  3rd  singular  masculine
ona         ella      personal  pronoun  3rd  singular  feminine
pan         usted     personal  pronoun  3rd  singular  masculine
pani        usted     personal  pronoun  3rd  singular  feminine
my          nosotros  personal  pronoun  1st  plural    masculine
my          nosotras  personal  pronoun  1st  plural    masculine
wy          vosotros  personal  pronoun  2nd  plural    masculine
wy          vosotras  personal  pronoun  2nd  plural    feminine
oni         ellos     personal  pronoun  3rd  plural    masculine
one         ellas     personal  pronoun  3rd  plural    feminine
państwo     ustedes   personal  pronoun  3rd  plural
# possessive pronouns
mój     mi        possessive  pronoun  1st  singular  masculine
moja    mi        possessive  pronoun  1st  singular  feminine
twój    tu        possessive  pronoun  2nd  singular  masculine
twoja   tu        possessive  pronoun  2nd  singular  feminine
jego    su        possessive  pronoun  3rd  singular  masculine
jej     su        possessive  pronoun  3rd  singular  feminine
nasz    nuestro   possessive  pronoun  1st  singular  masculine
nasza   nuestra   possessive  pronoun  1st  singular  feminine
wasz    vuestro   possessive  pronoun  2nd  singular  masculine
wasza   vuestra   possessive  pronoun  2nd  singular  feminine
ich     su        possessive  pronoun  3rd  singular
# plural possessive pronouns
moi     mis       possessive  pronoun  1st  plural  masculine
moje    mis       possessive  pronoun  1st  plural  feminine
twoi    tus       possessive  pronoun  2nd  plural  masculine
twoje   tus       possessive  pronoun  2nd  plural  feminine
jego    sus       possessive  pronoun  3rd  plural  masculine
jej     sus       possessive  pronoun  3rd  plural  feminine
nasi    nuestros  possessive  pronoun  1st  plural  masculine
nasze   nuestras  possessive  pronoun  1st  plural  feminine
wasi    vuestros  possessive  pronoun  2nd  plural  masculine
wasze   vuestras  possessive  pronoun  2nd  plural  feminine
ich     sus       possessive  pronoun  3rd  plural
# verb
jestem      soy    verb  1st  singular
jesteś      eres   verb  2nd  singular
jest        es     verb  3rd  singular
jesteśmy    somos  verb  1st  plural
jesteście   sois   verb  2nd  plural
są          son    verb  3rd  plural
# article
-   el      article  singular  masculine
-   la      article  singular  feminine
-   los     article  plural    masculine
-   las     article  plural    feminine
# nouns
przyjaciel          amigo           noun  singular  masculine
przyjaciółka        amiga           noun  singular  feminine
przyjaciele         amigos          noun  plural    masculine
przyjaciółki        amigas          noun  plural    feminine
Karol               Carlos          noun  singular  masculine   proper
Maria               Maria           noun  singular  masculine   proper
Karol i Jan         Carlos y Juan   noun  plural    masculine   proper
Maria i Agnieszka   Maria y Inez    noun  plural    feminine    proper
Jan i Maria         Juan y Maria    noun  plural                proper
# adjectives
przystojny  guapo       adjective   singular    masculine
przystojna  guapa       adjective   singular    feminine
przystojni  guapos      adjective   plural      masculine
przystojne  guapas      adjective   plural      feminine
wysoki      alto        adjective   singular    masculine
wysoka      alta        adjective   singular    feminine
wysocy      altos       adjective   plural      masculine
wysokie     altas       adjective   plural      feminine
